org.apache.archiva.redback.rest.api.services

Interface RoleManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRoleManagementService

    @Path(value="/roleManagementService/")
public interface RoleManagementService
    Author:
    Olivier Lamy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean assignRole(String roleId, String principal)
      Assigns the role indicated by the roleId to the given principal
      Boolean assignRoleByName(String roleName, String principal)
      Assigns the role indicated by the roleName to the given principal
      Boolean assignTemplatedRole(String templateId, String resource, String principal)
      Assigns the templated role indicated by the templateId fails if the templated role has not been created
      Boolean createTemplatedRole(String templateId, String resource) 
      List<Role> getAllRoles() 
      List<ApplicationRoles> getApplicationRoles(String username) 
      List<Application> getApplications(String username) 
      List<Role> getDetailedAllRoles() 
      List<Role> getEffectivelyAssignedRoles(String username) 
      Role getRole(String roleName) 
      Boolean removeTemplatedRole(String templateId, String resource)
      removes a role corresponding to the role Id that was manufactured with the given resource it also removes any user assignments for that role
      Boolean roleExists(String roleId)
      true of a role exists with the given roleId
      Boolean templatedRoleExists(String templateId, String resource)
      true of a role exists with the given roleId
      Boolean unassignRole(String roleId, String principal)
      Unassigns the role indicated by the role id from the given principal
      Boolean unassignRoleByName(String roleName, String principal)
      Unassigns the role indicated by the role name from the given principal
      Boolean updateRole(String templateId, String oldResource, String newResource)
      allows for a role coming from a template to be renamed effectively swapping out the bits of it that were labeled with the oldResource with the newResource it also manages any user assignments for that role
      Boolean updateRoleDescription(String roleName, String description) 
      Boolean updateRoleUsers(Role role)
      update users assigned to a role
      Boolean updateUserRoles(User user)
      update roles assigned to a user
      Boolean verifyTemplatedRole(String templateId, String resource)
      Check a role template is complete in the RBAC store.

      • updateRole

        @Path(value="updateRole")
 @GET
 @Produces(value={"application/json","application/xml","text/plain"})
Boolean updateRole(@QueryParam(value="templateId")
                                                                                                                         String templateId,
                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="oldResource")
                                                                                                                         String oldResource,
                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="newResource")
                                                                                                                         String newResource)
                                                                                                                  throws RedbackServiceException
        allows for a role coming from a template to be renamed effectively swapping out the bits of it that were labeled with the oldResource with the newResource it also manages any user assignments for that role
        Parameters:
        templateId -
        oldResource -
        newResource -
        Throws:
        RedbackServiceException
